mdscssModel

Class MissileDBManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • mdscssModel.MissileDBManager

  • public class MissileDBManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The MissileDBManager object manages a hashmap of missile IDs and a model representation of their states and attributes. This object is the primary means the controller and GUI retrieves and modifies information pertaining to missiles.

      boolean contains(java.lang.String pId)
      The contains function returns a boolean value that indicates whether or not the database contains a missile with the specified ID.
      java.lang.String getAssignedInterceptor(java.lang.String pId)
      The getAssignedInterceptor function retrieves an interceptor object that has an assigned threat with the id matching the given parameter.
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAssignedThreats()
      The getAssignedThreats function retrieves a list of IDs for every threat in the database that has been assigned an interceptor.

      • getAssignedInterceptor

        public java.lang.String getAssignedInterceptor(java.lang.String pId)
        The getAssignedInterceptor function retrieves an interceptor object that has an assigned threat with the id matching the given parameter.
        Parameters:
        pId - The id of the assigned threat
        Returns:
        The id of the interceptor that is assigned the given threat, or null if no such interceptor exists

      • contains

        public boolean contains(java.lang.String pId)
        The contains function returns a boolean value that indicates whether or not the database contains a missile with the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        pId - The id of the missile
        Returns:
        True if the database contains the missile, false otherwise

      • updateDatabase

        public void updateDatabase(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> idList)
        The updateDatabase function populates the database based upon the list of ID's given. If the given ID list does not contain an item present in the database, it will be removed from the database. If the list contains IDs for a missile that is not present in the database, it will be created and added.
        Parameters:
        idList - The list of ID's the database should mirror
